    • Constructor Detail

      • ExerciseMetadata

        public ExerciseMetadata(java.lang.String exerciseName,
                LanguageType languageType,
                java.util.Date startTime,
                java.util.Date deadline,
                long period,
                java.util.List<java.lang.String> compilerFlags)
        Defines specific information about an exercise.
        Parameters:
        exerciseName - name of the exercise
        languageType - the LanguageType of the exercise
        startTime - the time the exercise will start
        deadline - the time the exercise will collect submissions for the last time
        period - the time interval between two preDeadlineProcess runs
        compilerFlags - the flags being used to compile the submissions
